tool_description: Build and manage an eCommerce shopping cart for your app.
name: Shopify
title: Shopify

api_list.name: activateApplicationCharge
api_list.description: Activate a previously accepted one-time application charge.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: applicationChargeId
required_parameters.description: A unique numeric identifier for the application charge.

api_list.name: addProductToCollection
api_list.description: Add a product to a collection.

required_parameters.name: collectionId
required_parameters.description: The id of the custom collection containing the product.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: The unique numeric identifier for the product.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

api_list.name: calculateRefund
api_list.description: Calculate refund transactions based on line items and shipping. The returned response can be used to create a Refund. Note that returned transactions are of the kind "suggested_refund", which must to be changed to "refund" in order for them to be accepted.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: orderId
required_parameters.description: The unique numeric identifier for the refund. This one is used for API purposes.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

optional_parameters.name: shippingAmount
optional_parameters.description: Set specific amount of shipping to refund. Takes precedence over full_refund.

optional_parameters.name: shippingFullRefund
optional_parameters.description: Boolean, set to true to refund all remaining shipping.

optional_parameters.name: refundLineItems
optional_parameters.description: Array of JSON objects, of line item IDs and quantities to refund.

api_list.name: countCheckoutPayments
api_list.description: Count the number of Payments attempted on a Checkout.

required_parameters.name: token
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier for a particular checkout.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

api_list.name: createAccountActivationURL
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to generate and retrieve an account activation URL for a customer who is not yet enabled. This is useful if you've imported a large number of customers and want to send them activation emails all at once (using this approach, you'll need to generate and send the activation emails yourself). The account activation URL generated by this endpoint is one time use and will expire after 7 days. If you make a new POST request to this endpoint, a new URL will be generated which will be again valid for 7 days, but the previous URL will no longer be valid.

required_parameters.name: customerId
required_parameters.description: The id of the customer.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

api_list.name: createApplicationCharge
api_list.description: Create a new application charge.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: price
required_parameters.description: Price of new application charge

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Name of application charge

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: Url to return

api_list.name: createCheckout
api_list.description: Create a new Checkout.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: The customer's email address.

optional_parameters.name: lineItemsQuantity
optional_parameters.description: The number of products that were purchased.

optional_parameters.name: lineItemsVariantId
optional_parameters.description: The id of the product variant.

api_list.name: createCustomCollection
api_list.description: Create a new custom collection.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: Collections title.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

optional_parameters.name: collectsProductId
optional_parameters.description: The unique numeric identifier for the product.

optional_parameters.name: imageSrc
optional_parameters.description: Image associated with the custom collection.

optional_parameters.name: published
optional_parameters.description: Is published collection.

api_list.name: createCustomer
api_list.description: Create a new customer.

required_parameters.name: lastName
required_parameters.description: The customer's last name.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: firstName
required_parameters.description: The customer's first name.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

optional_parameters.name: phone
optional_parameters.description: The phone number for the customer. Valid formats can be of different types, for example: 6135551212, +16135551212, 555-1212, (613)555-1212, +1 613-555-1212.

optional_parameters.name: sendEmailInvite
optional_parameters.description: If true, Invite E-mail will be send.

optional_parameters.name: verifiedEmail
optional_parameters.description: States whether or not the email address has been verified.

optional_parameters.name: sendEmailWelcome
optional_parameters.description: If true, Welcome E-mail will be send.

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: The email address of the customer.

api_list.name: createOrderRefundByItems
api_list.description: Refund single or several items from an existing order.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: orderId
required_parameters.description: The unique numeric identifier for the order. This one is used for API purposes.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: refundLineItems
required_parameters.description: List of JSON objects. Array of line item IDs and quantities to refund.

optional_parameters.name: discrepancyReason
optional_parameters.description: An optional comment, used if there is a discrepancy between calculated and actual refund amounts (one of: restock, damage, customer, other).

optional_parameters.name: shippingFullRefund
optional_parameters.description: Boolean, set to true to refund all remaining shipping.

optional_parameters.name: shippingAmount
optional_parameters.description: Set specific amount of shipping to refund. Takes precedence over full_refund.

optional_parameters.name: notify
optional_parameters.description: Boolean, set to true to send a refund notification to the customer.

optional_parameters.name: restock
optional_parameters.description: Boolean, whether or not to add the line items back to the store inventory.

optional_parameters.name: note
optional_parameters.description: An optional comment attached to a refund.

api_list.name: createOrderRefundByTransaction
api_list.description: Refund single or several transactions from an existing order.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: orderId
required_parameters.description: The unique numeric identifier for the order. This one is used for API purposes.

required_parameters.name: transactions
required_parameters.description: List of JSON objects. Array of transactions to process as refunds.

optional_parameters.name: notify
optional_parameters.description: Boolean, set to true to send a refund notification to the customer.

optional_parameters.name: discrepancyReason
optional_parameters.description: An optional comment, used if there is a discrepancy between calculated and actual refund amounts (one of: restock, damage, customer, other).

optional_parameters.name: shippingAmount
optional_parameters.description: Set specific amount of shipping to refund. Takes precedence over full_refund.

optional_parameters.name: restock
optional_parameters.description: Boolean, whether or not to add the line items back to the store inventory.

optional_parameters.name: note
optional_parameters.description: An optional comment attached to a refund.

optional_parameters.name: shippingFullRefund
optional_parameters.description: Boolean, set to true to refund all remaining shipping.

api_list.name: createPayment
api_list.description: Create a new payment.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: token
required_parameters.description: Unique identifier for a particular checkout.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

optional_parameters.name: requestDetailsUserAgent
optional_parameters.description: A string identifying the customer's user agent.

optional_parameters.name: requestDetailsIpAddress
optional_parameters.description: The IP address of the customer.

optional_parameters.name: sessionId
optional_parameters.description: Represents the id that was returned by the card vault.

optional_parameters.name: requestDetailsAcceptLanguage
optional_parameters.description: A string identifying the customer's preferred language, formatted according to the Accept-Language header as defined in RFC2616 Section 14.4.

optional_parameters.name: amount
optional_parameters.description: Amount of payment.

api_list.name: createProduct
api_list.description: Create a new product.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: The name of the product. In a shop's catalog, clicking on a product's title takes you to that product's page. On a product's page, the product's title typically appears in a large font.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

optional_parameters.name: productType
optional_parameters.description: A categorization that a product can be tagged with, commonly used for filtering and searching.

optional_parameters.name: vendor
optional_parameters.description: The name of the vendor of the product.

optional_parameters.name: bodyHtml
optional_parameters.description: The description of the product, complete with HTML formatting.

optional_parameters.name: imageSrc
optional_parameters.description: Image associated with the product.

optional_parameters.name: published
optional_parameters.description: Is published product.

optional_parameters.name: variants
optional_parameters.description: List of JSON objects. List of variant objects, each one representing a slightly different version of the product. For example, if a product comes in different sizes and colors, each size and color permutation (such as 'small black', 'medium black', 'large blue'), would be a variant.

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: A categorization that a product can be tagged with, commonly used for filtering and searching. Each of tag has a character limit of 255.

api_list.name: createProductImage
api_list.description: Create a new product image.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: The unique numeric identifier for the product.

optional_parameters.name: imageSrc
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the location of the product image. Use one of imageSrc or attachment

optional_parameters.name: metafieldsKey
optional_parameters.description: Identifier for the metafield (maximum of 30 characters).

optional_parameters.name: metafieldsValueType
optional_parameters.description: States whether the information in the value is stored as a 'string' or 'integer'.

optional_parameters.name: filename
optional_parameters.description: Custom image file name.

optional_parameters.name: metafieldsValue
optional_parameters.description: Information to be stored as metadata.

optional_parameters.name: attachment
optional_parameters.description: Base64 of image file. Use one of imageSrc or attachment

optional_parameters.name: position
optional_parameters.description: The order of the product image in the list. The first product image is at position 1 and is the 'main' image for the product.

optional_parameters.name: metafieldsNamespace
optional_parameters.description: Container for a set of metadata. Namespaces help distinguish between metadata you created against metadata created by another individual with a similar namespace (maximum of 20 characters).

optional_parameters.name: variantIds
optional_parameters.description: List of variant ids associated with the image.

api_list.name: createProductVariant
api_list.description: Create a new product variant.

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: The unique numeric identifier for the product.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: variant
required_parameters.description: JSON Object with pair key - value for variant.

api_list.name: createSmartCollection
api_list.description: Create a new smart collection.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: The name of the smart collection. Limit of 255 characters.

optional_parameters.name: bodyHtml
optional_parameters.description: The description of the smart collection, complete with HTML markup. Many templates display this on their smart collection page.

optional_parameters.name: published
optional_parameters.description: Is published collection.

optional_parameters.name: imageSrc
optional_parameters.description: The collection image.

optional_parameters.name: rules
optional_parameters.description: List of JSON objects. The list of rules that define what products go into the smart collection.

api_list.name: createTransaction
api_list.description: Create new transaction.

required_parameters.name: kind
required_parameters.description: Permitted values are: authorization, capture, sale, void, refund.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: orderId
required_parameters.description: The unique numeric identifier for the refund. This one is used for API purposes.

optional_parameters.name: amount
optional_parameters.description: The amount of money that the transaction was for.

api_list.name: getAbandonedCheckoutsCount
api_list.description: Get a count of abandoned checkouts.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

optional_parameters.name: updatedAtMax
optional_parameters.description: Show checkouts last updated before date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

optional_parameters.name: sinceId
optional_parameters.description: Restrict results to after the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: createdAtMax
optional_parameters.description: Show checkouts created before date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: Takes: open - All open abandoned checkouts (default), closed - Show only closed abandoned checkouts.

optional_parameters.name: updatedAtMin
optional_parameters.description: Show checkouts last updated after date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

optional_parameters.name: createdAtMin
optional_parameters.description: Show checkouts created after date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

api_list.name: getAbandonedCheckouts
api_list.description: List all abandoned checkouts.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page to show (default: 1).

optional_parameters.name: createdAtMin
optional_parameters.description: Show checkouts created after date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: Takes: open - All open abandoned checkouts (default), closed - Show only closed abandoned checkouts.

optional_parameters.name: updatedAtMin
optional_parameters.description: Show checkouts last updated after date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Amount of results (default: 50) (maximum: 250).

optional_parameters.name: createdAtMax
optional_parameters.description: Show checkouts created before date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

optional_parameters.name: sinceId
optional_parameters.description: Restrict results to after the specified ID.

optional_parameters.name: updatedAtMax
optional_parameters.description: Show checkouts last updated before date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

api_list.name: getAccessToken

required_parameters.name: clientSecret
required_parameters.description: The Shared Secret for the app (Credential sets).

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: The authorization code provided in the redirect described.

required_parameters.name: clientId
required_parameters.description: The API Key for the app.

api_list.name: getCollectsCount

required_parameters.name: accessToken

api_list.name: getCustomCollectionsCount
api_list.description: Get a count of all custom collections.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

optional_parameters.name: updatedAtMax
optional_parameters.description: Count custom collections last updated before date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

optional_parameters.name: productId
optional_parameters.description: Count custom collections that includes given product.

optional_parameters.name: publishedAtMax
optional_parameters.description: Show custom collections published before date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: Count custom collections with given title.

optional_parameters.name: updatedAtMin
optional_parameters.description: Count custom collections last updated after date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

optional_parameters.name: publishedAtMin
optional_parameters.description: Show custom collections published after date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

optional_parameters.name: publishedStatus
optional_parameters.description: Takes: published - Show only published custom collections, unpublished - Show only unpublished custom collections, any - Show all custom collections (default).

optional_parameters.name: updatedAtMax
optional_parameters.description: Show custom collections last updated before date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

optional_parameters.name: publishedAtMax
optional_parameters.description: Show custom collections published before date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

optional_parameters.name: handle

optional_parameters.name: updatedAtMin
optional_parameters.description: Show custom collections last updated after date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

optional_parameters.name: sinceId

optional_parameters.name: publishedAtMin
optional_parameters.description: Show custom collections published after date (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00).

optional_parameters.name: publishedStatus
optional_parameters.description: Takes: published - Show only published custom collections, unpublished - Show only unpublished custom collections, any - Show all custom collections (default).

api_list.name: getShippingRates
api_list.description: Get a list of available shipping rates for the specified checkout. Implementers need to poll this API until rates become available. Each shipping rate will also contain the checkout's subtotal_price, total_tax and total_price in the event that this shipping rate is selected. This can be used to update the UI without performing a road-trip to API.

api_list.description: Update a customer.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: customerId
required_parameters.description: The id of the customer.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: The email address of the customer.

optional_parameters.name: firstName
optional_parameters.description: The customer's first name.

optional_parameters.name: lastName
optional_parameters.description: The customer's last name.

optional_parameters.name: note
optional_parameters.description: A note about the customer.

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: List of tags. For example, if an article has three tags: tag1, tag2, tag3.

api_list.name: updateProduct
api_list.description: Update a product and associated variants and images.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: The unique numeric identifier for the product.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

optional_parameters.name: bodyHtml
optional_parameters.description: The description of the product, complete with HTML formatting.

optional_parameters.name: vendor
optional_parameters.description: The name of the vendor of the product.

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: The name of the product. In a shop's catalog, clicking on a product's title takes you to that product's page. On a product's page, the product's title typically appears in a large font.

optional_parameters.name: productType
optional_parameters.description: A categorization that a product can be tagged with, commonly used for filtering and searching.

optional_parameters.name: published
optional_parameters.description: Is published product.

optional_parameters.name: variants
optional_parameters.description: List of JSON objects. List of variant objects, each one representing a slightly different version of the product. For example, if a product comes in different sizes and colors, each size and color permutation (such as 'small black', 'medium black', 'large blue'), would be a variant..

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: A categorization that a product can be tagged with, commonly used for filtering and searching. Each tag has a character limit of 255.

api_list.name: updateProductImage
api_list.description: Modify an existing product image.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: imageId
required_parameters.description: A unique numeric identifier for the product image.

required_parameters.name: productId
required_parameters.description: The unique numeric identifier for the product.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

optional_parameters.name: metafieldsKey
optional_parameters.description: Identifier for the metafield (maximum of 30 characters).

optional_parameters.name: metafieldsValueType
optional_parameters.description: States whether the information in the value is stored as a 'string' or 'integer'.

optional_parameters.name: metafieldsNamespace
optional_parameters.description: Container for a set of metadata. Namespaces help distinguish between metadata you created against metadata created by another individual with a similar namespace (maximum of 20 characters).

optional_parameters.name: metafieldsValue
optional_parameters.description: Information to be stored as metadata.

optional_parameters.name: position
optional_parameters.description: The order of the product image in the list. The first product image is at position 1 and is the 'main' image for the product.

optional_parameters.name: variantIds
optional_parameters.description: List of variant ids associated with the image.

api_list.name: updateProductVariant
api_list.description: Update an existing product variant.

required_parameters.name: variant
required_parameters.description: JSON Object with pair key - value for variant.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: variantId
required_parameters.description: The unique numeric identifier for the product variant.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

api_list.name: updateSmartCollection
api_list.description: Update an existing smart collection.

required_parameters.name: accessToken
required_parameters.description: API access token that can be used to access the shop’s data as long as the client is installed.

required_parameters.name: smartCollectionId
required_parameters.description: The unique numeric identifier for the smart collection.

required_parameters.name: shopName
required_parameters.description: Domain of your shop.

optional_parameters.name: title
optional_parameters.description: The name of the smart collection. Limit of 255 characters.

optional_parameters.name: imageSrc
optional_parameters.description: The collection image.

optional_parameters.name: bodyHtml
optional_parameters.description: The description of the smart collection, complete with HTML markup. Many templates display this on their smart collection page.

optional_parameters.name: published
optional_parameters.description: Is published collection.

optional_parameters.name: rules
optional_parameters.description: List of JSON objects. The list of rules that define what products go into the smart collection.

api_list.name: webhookEvent
api_list.description: This method is called every time a shopify event occurs on a shop

required_parameters.name: token
required_parameters.description: Token sent on each message
